==== Ubuntu Women ====

* Team meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20110210|February 10th]]</nowiki>
* February 10th Special UDS Diversity Outreach Meeting #1 (<nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2011/02/10/%23ubuntu-women-project.html#t19:00|Logs]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-February/003161.html|Minutes]]</nowiki>)
* February 17th Special UDS Diversity Outreach Meeting #2 (<nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2011/02/17/%23ubuntu-women-project.html#t19:01|Logs]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-February/003174.html|Minutes]]</nowiki>)
* To encourage more diversity, team members blogged about sponsorship
** <nowiki>[[http://linuxgrandma.blogspot.com/2011/02/its-time-apply-now-uds-o.html|It's time -- apply NOW! UDS -O]]</nowiki> by Valorie Zimmerman
** <nowiki>[[http://princessleia.com/journal/?p=4016|Thinking About Ubuntu Developer Summit Attendance and Sponsorship?]]</nowiki> by Elizabeth Krumbach
** <nowiki>[[http://www.jessicaledbetter.com/calling-all-contributors-to-ubuntu/|Calling all contributors to Ubuntu]]</nowiki> by Jessica Ledbetter
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-46/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #46]]</nowiki> with interview of Kubuntu Member Valorie Zimmerman
* Of the 633 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 5.06% are women (28 February 2011)
